FuncDef:
The fr interface-type command configures an FR interface type.
The undo fr interface-type command restores the default configuration.
By default, FR interfaces are DTE.

ParaDef.Info:
Sets the FR interface type to DCE.
-

Sets the FR interface type to DTE.
-

Sets the FR interface type to NNI.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
FR networks allow devices to exchange data. The devices and interfaces on an FR network can be:
DTE: data terminal equipment. Its interfaces are DTE interfaces.DCE: data communication equipment, providing network access for DTEs.NNI: network-network interface, connecting DCEs.
A DTE interface can be connected only to a DCE interface, and an NNI interface can be connected only to an NNI interface. The type of the FR interface on an FR switch must be an NNI or DCE.

Prerequisites
The link layer protocol of the interface has been set to FR using the link-protocol fr command.
Configuration Impact
If the fr interface-type command is run more than once, the latest configuration overrides the previous one.
Precautions
The fr interface-type command configuration will affect LMI negotiation.
